news.title: Huge drugs bust reveals battles on cocaine 'superhighway'
news.summary: An audacious attempt to smuggle tonnes of cocaine was stopped, but pressure from drug cartels remains.

news.title: Ex-sergeant major admits sexually assaulting soldier who took her own life
news.summary: Michael Webber pleaded guilty to sexual assault against teenage soldier Jaysley Beck, who was left traumatised by the incident.

news.title: 'He put his hand down my tights': Sexual harassment widespread among barristers, review finds
news.summary: Widespread problems with sexual harassment and bullying within the Bar are detailed in a report.

news.title: European leaders to visit US to discuss war in Ukraine, Trump says
news.summary: Trump's comments came as he signalled his administration would impose a second phase of sanctions on Moscow.

news.title: Palestinian prisoners not being given adequate food, Israel top court says
news.summary: The court said the state is legally obligated to provide enough food to ensure "a basic level of existence."

news.title: What it was like inside court as mushroom murderer was jailed for life
news.summary: The BBC's Katy Watson was in the courtroom as Erin Patterson was sentenced to life.

news.title: 'Barrack to square one' on asylum and 'stop making mistakes'
news.summary: Plans to move migrants to former military barracks and warnings from Labour figures feature in Monday's papers.

news.summary: Think you can work out where's hotter and colder than you today? Find out by playing our game

news.title: TUC chief calls on ministers to show 'whose side' they are on
news.summary: Paul Nowak will tell his annual conference the government must do more for working class communities.

news.title: Mahmood to host security allies for talks on tackling people smuggling
news.summary: The home secretary will meet with counterparts from the US, Canada, Australia and New Zealand.
